Seram! Orang Ini Makan dan Hidup di Atap Rumah hingga Mati
06 Nov 2019, 03:32 by Sonia Basoni - detikFood


Foto: Istimewa

Jakarta - Penyusup yang hidup di dalam rumah orang lain, dan mengambil makanan di malam hari memang menyeramkan. Hingga akhirnya pengalaman orang ini jadi viral di internet.Seorang penulis novel misteri bernama Grady Hendrix, yang berasal dari New York, baru saja membagikan pengalaman seramnya saat ia kecil. Pengalamannya ini bahkan membuatnya sempat trauma, dan ketakutan hingga sekarang.Baca Juga: Seram! Pelayan Restoran Ini Bersihkan Meja Ditemani HantuDilansir dari News Week (05/11), Grady menceritakan kisah masa kecilnya di Twitter. Saat usianya masih sembilan tahun, ia pernah diam-diam menyusup ke dalam dapur di malam hari, untuk menyantap sisa makanan, setelah anggota keluarganya sudah terlelap tidur.


Foto: Istimewa

"Ketika saya berusia 9 tahun, saya sadar bahwa saya bisa menyusup ke dapur, dan menyantap makanan apapun yang saya inginkan di dalam kulkas," tulisnya.Saat ia tengah berhati-hati agar tak menimbulkan suara. Ia melihat pemandangan yang tak biasa di dapurnya yang gelap gulita. Ia mendengar ada suara dentingan garpu, dan membuatnya takut setengah mati."Lampu dari dalam microwave menunjukkan adanya bayangan seorang pria asing, yang tengah duduk di meja dapur. Pria itu tak bisa melihat saya, tapi saya melihat dirinya. Pria itu bertubuh kurus, tengah menyantap makanan sisa milik keluarga saya, dan meminum susu langsung dari tempatnya," jelas Grady.Terkejut dan takut melihat orang asing makan di dalam rumahnya. Ia pun membangunkan kedua orang tuanya, sayangnya ketika mereka sampai di dapur, pria misterius itu sudah menghilang. Akhirnya Grady menganggap bahwa pria itu hanya halusinasinya semata, karena ia terlalu sering membaca komik misteri.


Foto: Istimewa

Tapi Grady mulai penasaran. Ia mulai memperhatikan setiap tata letak makanan yang ada di dapur, hingga bagian kulkas. Untuk memastikan, apakah ada orang lain yang makan di dapur mereka ketika malam hari."Suatu hari saya melihat lap dapur berubah di tempat yang berbeda. Kemudian saya menyadari ada gelas kotor, yang sebelumnya tidak ada di cucian piring,"Sanking takutnya, kamar Grady yang tak memiliki kunci, membuatnya tidur dengan dengan pisau steak di bawah bantalnya untuk berjaga-jaga. Beberapa bulan kemudian, ketika Grady tengah membaca buku di dalam kamarnya, ia melihat ada ventilasi pendingin udara (AC) di sana."Suatu malam ada banyak belatung berwarna putih yang jatuh di atas tempat tidur saya. Petugas servis AC mengatakan, mungkin ada hewan yang masuk ke dalam sana dan mati, sehingga bangkainya digerogoti belatung," jelasnya lebih lanjut.Ternyata benar ada sesuatu di ventilasi kamarnya, yaitu jasad seorang pria yang sudah membusuk, dan dipenuhi oleh belatung. Pria yang sama, yang pernah dilihat Grady tengah menyantap makanan di malam hari.


Foto: Istimewa

"Kami tinggal di rumah yang cukup besar, dengan ruang yang cukup luas di antara dinding. Jadi pria itu sudah hidup diam-diam di rumah kami sejak bulan Mei, hingga Agustus,"Grady menjelaskan bahwa identitas jasad pria itu tak pernah diketahui. Namun keluarganya memutuskan untuk menguburnya, dengan nama John Doe."Hingga hari ini saya tidak bisa melihat atap, atau ventilasi udara yang ada di rumah-rumah. Saya sering melihat ke ventilasi udara yang ada di rumah orang, dan berpikir apakah ada seseorang yang hidup diam-diam di dalam sana?" pungkas Grady.Kisah Grady ini viral di Twitter, dan mendapatkan lebih dari 22,886 Retweets dan 64,558 Likes.Baca Juga: Merinding! 5 Cerita Hantu Ini Sering Dialami oleh Pedagang Makanan Malam Simak Video "Menikmati Baklava dan Kunava, Pastry Terlezat dari Turki"[Gambas:Video 20detik](sob/odi)

Scary! This Man Eats and Lives on the House Roof to Death
Nov 6 2019, 03:32 by Sonia Basoni - detikFood


Photo: Special

Jakarta - Intruders who live in someone else's house and take food at night are scary. Until finally this person's experience went viral on the internet. A mystery novel writer named Grady Hendrix, who came from New York, had just shared his scary experience when he was a child. This experience even made him traumatized, and scared until now. Also Read: Scary! This Restaurant Waitress Cleans the Table Accompanied by Ghosts Reported from News Week (05/11), Grady tells the story of his childhood on Twitter. When he was only nine years old, he had secretly sneaked into the kitchen at night, to eat leftovers, after his family members had fallen asleep.


Photo: Special

"When I was 9 years old, I realized that I could sneak into the kitchen, and eat whatever food I wanted in the refrigerator," he wrote. When he was careful not to make a sound. He saw an unusual sight in his pitch black kitchen. He heard the sound of a clang of a fork, and scared him to death. "The lights from the microwave showed the shadow of a strange man, who was sitting at the kitchen table. The man could not see me, but I saw him. The man was thin, middle eating leftover food belonging to my family, and drinking milk directly from its place, "explained Grady. Shocked and afraid to see strangers eating in his house. He also woke up his parents, unfortunately when they arrived in the kitchen, the mysterious man had disappeared. In the end Grady assumed that he was merely hallucinating him, because he too often read mystery comics.


Photo: Special

But Grady was getting curious. He began to pay attention to every layout of food in the kitchen, to the refrigerator. To be sure, is there anyone else who eats in their kitchen at night. "One day I saw kitchen towels changing in different places. Then I realized there were dirty glasses, which were not in the dishwasher before," Sanking was afraid, Grady's room who doesn't have a key, makes him sleep with a steak knife under his pillow just in case. A few months later, when Grady was reading a book in his room, he saw there was an air conditioning vent there. "One night there were many white maggots that fell on my bed. The AC service officer said, maybe there were animals that go in there and die, so that the corpse was gnawed by maggots, "he explained further. It turned out that there was something in the ventilation of his room, the body of a man who had rotted, and was filled with maggots. The same man Grady had seen was eating food at night.


Photo: Special

"We live in a fairly large house, with a fairly large space between the walls. So the man has been living quietly in our house from May, until August," Grady explained that the identity of the man's body was never known. But his family decided to bury him, under the name of John Doe. "To this day I cannot see the roof, or the air vents in homes. I often look at the air vents in people's homes, and think whether someone is alive quietly in there? " concluded Grady. This story of Grady is viral on Twitter, and gets more than 22,886 Retweets and 64,558 Likes.
